text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the 2018 Newest Dell Gaming IPS Panel Laptop|15"Full HD|8th Gen Intel Six Core i7-8750H|8GB RAM|128GB SSD+1TB HDD|NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050Ti-4G|Wi-Fi 5 Dual-Band |Windows 10 Home | Alpine White. It blue screens occasionally frequently when playing Valorant, and the performance throttles significantly. The screen brightness has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Avoid the 2018 Newest Dell Gaming IPS Panel Laptop|15"Full HD|8th Gen Intel Six Core i7-8750H|8GB RAM|128GB SSD+1TB HDD|NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050Ti-4G|Wi-Fi 5 Dual-Band |Windows 10 Home | Alpine White if you can. The NVIDIA GTX1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.

Avoid the 2018 Newest Dell Gaming IPS Panel Laptop|15"Full HD|8th Gen Intel Six Core i7-8750H|8GB RAM|128GB SSD+1TB HDD|NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050Ti-4G|Wi-Fi 5 Dual-Band |Windows 10 Home | Alpine White if you can. The NVIDIA GTX1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The chassis feels surprisingly flimsy for the price.. Looking to return it.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the 2018 Newest Dell Gaming IPS Panel Laptop|15"Full HD|8th Gen Intel Six Core i7-8750H|8GB RAM|128GB SSD+1TB HDD|NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050Ti-4G|Wi-Fi 5 Dual-Band |Windows 10 Home | Alpine White. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The build material has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
